summary: A slobbering St. Bernard becomes the center of attention for a loving family, but must contend with a dog-napping veterinarian and his henchmen.
cast: Charles Grodin|Bonnie Hunt|Dean Jones|Nicholle Tom|Christopher Castile|Sarah Rose Karr|Oliver Platt|Stanley Tucci|David Duchovny|Patricia Heaton|Laurel Cronin|O-Lan Jones|Nancy Fish|Craig Pinkard|Robi Davidson|Sherri Paysinger|Patrick LaBrecque|Jacob Kenner|Matthew Brooks|Chris Little|Lisa Gerber|Cory Danziger|Colleen O'Hara|Nicolas Mize|Maxine Elliott Hicks|Stephanie Durrer|Cirroc Lofton|Chad Morton|Melora Walters|Holly Wortell|Lorraine Marga|Joseph Gordon-Levitt|Andres McKenzie|Chris|Cujo|Richard Portnow
